name: Growth (Amir Rave)
description:
Growth is a short platforming adventure about learning from and overcoming your mistakes and failures. 

(can you find the hidden amogus?)

heres a link to a playthrough, in case you get stuck: 

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Z to jump

X to dash (Unlocked later)

Credits

Platform: Pico-8, a fantasy game console.

Music and SFX: Celeste Classic on Pico-8
